name: Nico Robin
text:
[Blocker]
[On K.O] [DON!! -1]: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 {Strawhat Crew} type card and put it into your hand. Then place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 {Strawhat Crew} type card and put it into your hand. Then place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

meta.notes: DON!! -1 means return 1 DON!! card from field to DON!! deck as cost
